title: Communication Help: Lack of Understanding (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Lack of Understanding subcategory within Communication Help. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.japanese: すみません。分かりません。
日本語は分かりません。

cards.english: I don't understand what this Japanese means.
cards.japanese: この日本語は分かりません。
